about.content: My journey into development began with the desire to create my own video games using platforms such as Unreal Engine, Unity, and even Godot. Gradually, my interest shifted towards mobile development with Flutter. I embarked on a self-taught learning journey, relying on resources like YouTube and online courses. Realizing that software development was truly my passion, I made the decision to resign from my job in fast food to fully dedicate myself to learning code. Currently, I am enrolled in a training program to obtain the title of Web and Mobile Web Developer (DWWM). ✨

projects.title: CinéRoye
projects.description: A Flutter application that retrieves films showing in my city by scraping data from a website
projects.content: The idea behind this application was to learn how to scrape data from the internet and display it on a landing page. We can browse through the currently showing movies to see the showtimes and their summaries.

projects.title: Santa Claus Website
projects.description: During my training, we were challenged to create a site for Santa Claus.
projects.content:
After a month of training, we were offered to create a website for Santa Claus. I took on the challenge to learn more about creating a website with PHP. It was very enriching, and I learned a lot during this exercise.

Unfortunately, I didn't finish it, but I am satisfied with the experience.

projects.title: Dice Game Javascript
projects.description: An exercise to make a game using Javascript
projects.content: During my training, in an exercise, we were asked to create a dice game. I used JavaScript for the game mechanics and implemented animations to make the game more enjoyable.

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.description: After three months of training I decided to create my own portfolio, the one on which you are reading this.
projects.content:
In order to find an internship during my training, I needed a website to showcase my work. So, I developed this website by creating its mockup via Figma.

The goal was to create a simple yet elegant interface. I drew inspiration from GitHub to establish a connection with the programming community. I used JavaScript to make my site more dynamic by adding animations, the menu, and tab arrows for example.

To simplify maintenance, all my projects, blog articles, and the "about" section are retrieved from a JSON file that contains all the information to be displayed. Everything is managed by JavaScript for dynamic rendering.

Blog.title: ﻿Is this the beginning of a new life?
Blog.description: It is official, I have resigned from my job in the restaurant where I worked for over 8 years to fully dedicate myself to what excites me, which is development.
Blog.content:
My wife and family support me in this decision, as it does not come without consequences to launch in this direction; I must give everything to achieve my goals, I want to create, build things on the internet. What was just a hobby between my breaks from fast food will become my job, I would do whatever it takes to get there.

I will keep this blog updated with my progress in my journey of reorientation towards web and mobile development.
